title: What I look like when people be talking bad about my main.

replies.body:
So what your saying is... your a little krabby XD

*... me 5 seconds later...*

 http://wp.patheos.com.s3.amazonaws.com/blogs/barefootandpregnant/files/2013/05/box-of-shame-gif.gif

I regret nothing .__.
I liken myself to a sion main. but I am a crab. if they release scuttle as a playable character, my main will change to scuttle crab.

Ahh, I love killing you when I play JG

So useful... But weak
just wait until you piss scuttle off. those claws are for more than digging.

You're right, they're for running too

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Shaco-the-Demon-Jester-217441983

I see you threw a knife at me. thanks, I'll take that.
https://media.giphy.com/media/l4KhYvCb3xitaWv1m/giphy.gif
Fine... I have several hundred anyway
I like it better when they struggle.

http://65.media.tumblr.com/9bc258dd0e50adfa4217e5f81c396883/tumblr_inline_njochm1NjJ1t3cjxf.gif

Its times like this that you gotta ask yourself, are you feeling lucky?
yep. only wish they didn't ruin hextech sions splash. tis my favorite skin.
